General.Name: Erech Finance Cahalacha Ltd
General.Description: Erech Finance Cahalacha Ltd, together with its subsidiaries, provides loans and credit services to small and medium sized enterprises, associations, and individual borrowers in Israel. It operates through Non-Bank Credit and Biomed Drug segments. The company is also involved in the development of drugs in the areas of diabetes and cancer. Erech Finance Cahalacha Ltd is based in Jerusalem, Israel.
